name: Fruit Salad Madness
description:
Fruit Salad Madness is a small arcade platformer made with the Godot engine. I made this project to try, learn and see what it could do.

Collect all the fruit in a level and reach the flag pole to unlock and go to the next level. The game is short (40 one screen levels).

  • Controller are supported.
  • You can move using the left/right arrow or A/D, D-pad or Joystick on controller.
  • You can jump using the up arrow or W, South button on controller(A for Xbox, X for PlayStation and B for Nintendo).
  • you can pause the game using Escape, start button on controller.
  • The game save each time a level is complete. saving include options and level progression.

The game is finished and will not receive any other update.

Enjoy and feel free to leave a comment if you try it!

Art made by Pixel Frog, go check his work! https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/.
